attributes.action: Add cats to the road traffic act 1988
attributes.additional_details: My cat was recently hit by a car and left to die at the side of the road. Cats like dogs are someone’s pet and are a major part of the family they belong to. They are every bit as important as a dog and therefore should also be covered by the law.
attributes.background: To add cats to the road traffic act 1988, so if a cat gets hit by a cat the person responsible has to report it.

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about what happened to your cat.

We have an open petition calling for the same action which you may wish to sign:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300310
